solution:
# Fixed variable names following Python conventions
my_variable = 42
user_name = "Alice"
MAX_VALUE = 100
get_user_age = lambda: 25

# Use the corrected names
print(my_variable)
print(user_name)
print(MAX_VALUE)
print(get_user_age())
hints: Never use hyphens in variable names

testCases.description: Should print correct values with proper naming
